row.process:
!Detect assigned artifact :SET &MISSING_ARTIFACT# = STR_STARTS_WITH(&UC4RB_ARTIFACT_ID#, "EXT:") :IF &MISSING_ARTIFACT# = "Y" : PSET &UC4RB_USE_ARTIFACT# = NO : PRINT "There is no artifact assigned to this component" : STOP NOMSG, 50, "There is no artifact assigned to this component" :ELSE : PSET &UC4RB_USE_ARTIFACT# = YES :ENDIF
!Detect staging mode :IF &UC4RB_ENABLE_STAGING# = "YES" : IF &UC4RB_STAGING_AGENT# <> "" : PRINT Download Artifact via staging agent '&UC4RB_STAGING_AGENT#' : PSET &UC4RB_USE_STAGING# = YES : ELSE : PRINT Download Artifact directly without staging agent : PSET &UC4RB_USE_STAGING# = NO : ENDIF :ELSE : PRINT Staging is disable. Download Artifact directly without staging agent. : PSET &UC4RB_USE_STAGING# = NO :ENDIF
!Update RunID
:SET &TOP_NR# = SYS_ACT_TOP_NR() :PSET &UC4RB_RUN_ID# = FORMAT(&TOP_NR#, "0")
:PRINT Prepare Artifact VARA :SET &VARA_NAME# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PRV.VARA.TEMP.ARTIFACT." :SET &VARA_NAME# = STR_CAT(&VARA_NAME#, &UC4RB_RUN_ID#) :SET &VARA_NAME# = STR_CAT(&VARA_NAME#, ".") :SET &VARA_NAME# = STR_CAT(&VARA_NAME#, &UC4RB_ARTIFACT_ID#)
:SET &RET# = CREATE_OBJECT("VARA", &VARA_NAME#, "PACKAGES/APPDATA/TEMP/VARIABLES", "", "I", "C", "FREE",)
:SET &UC4RB_ARTIFACT_VARA_NAME# = &VARA_NAME#

row.value: Archive type was not set for this artifact
Failed to download from Artifact Source
Failed to copy Artifact's content to target directory
